title: Cuckoo Watch Face Christmas

descriptionHTML:
Cuckoo Watch Face Christmas

Looking for a festive cuckoo clock design for your Android Wear device? Cuckoo Watch Face Christmas puts a wintery cuckoo clock on your wrist and turns your Smartwatch into a Christmassy timepiece. Simple and wintery elements flatter your smartwatch and give the watch the finishing touch.

At the top of each hour a cuckoo will delight your heart. A lovely figure appears and moves on your watch face at every full hour.

Feature list:
• Easy installing process
• High resolution design
• Ambient/dimmed mode
• Round and square watches support
• Compatible with all Android Wear devices
• Analog display
• Animation of the cuckoo at the top of each hour


Season’s Greetings!
comments: Its ok I really wish it made sounds
